snippet: Peter Cummings, former head of corporate lending at HBOS, was barred from working in Britain's financial services sector and fined $805,000 for aggressive lending practices that eventually led to major losses at the British bank.
abstract: Peter Cummings, former head of corporate lending at HBOS, was barred from working in Britain's financial services sector and fined $805,000 for aggressive lending practices that eventually led to major losses at the British bank.

headline.main: British Banker Barred Over Role in Financial Crisis
